name: Exciting, Energetic "E" Trivia Game | Alphabetics | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the state motto of California?
questions.explanation:
Eureka.

	Eureka is the state motto of California. It means "I have found it".

questions.text: What is the interval between two acts of a theatrical performance?
questions.explanation:
Entr'acte.

	The Entr'acte is to the second act, what the overture is to Act I. Entr'acte means "between acts".

questions.text: In French, to make the passé composé most verbs require a form of "avoir" and a past participle. Some verbs require another verb instead of "avoir." What is that verb?
questions.explanation:
etre.

	"Etre" is used with reflexive verbs and Dr. & Mrs. Vandertramp verbs. These verbs include: devenir (to become), retourner (to return), mourir (to die), rentrer (to reenter), sortir (to go out), venir (to come), arriver (to arrive), naître (to be born), descendre (to go down), entrer (to enter), revenir (to come back), tomber (to fall), rester (to rest), aller (to go), monter (to go up) and partir (to leave).  "Ennuyer" and "envoyer" both take avoir not etre. Ennuyer means to bore and envoyer means to send.

questions.text: What is another word for mystery?
questions.explanation:
enigma.

	In "Batman Forever" the Riddler's name is E. Nigma.  When they try to figure out his name he tells that "My name is a mystery to all." Enigma is another word for mystery.

questions.text: In "Hello Dolly" what is the name of Dolly's deceased husband?
questions.explanation:
Ephraim.

	Dolly says that Ephraim used to say "Money is like horse manure, it's not good unless it can be spread around encouraging things to grow."

questions.text: What is Cliff Clavin's mother's name on "Cheers"?
questions.explanation:
Esther.

	Esther Clavin was played by Frances Sternhagen.

questions.text: What is the name of the Douglas' cow on "Green Acres"?
questions.explanation:
Eleanor.

	Lisa and Oliver Douglas owned Eleanor the cow. They also owned a hen named Henrietta.

questions.text: I am a large flightless bird. I am related to the ostrich. I come from Australia. What am I?
questions.explanation:
Emu.

	The Emu is the second largest bird in the world.

questions.text: Chang is the name of one of the first Siamese twins ever recorded as being born, what was the name of his twin brother?
questions.explanation:
Eng.

	Chang and Eng were born in Siam in 1811.

questions.text: What is the fifth (5th) letter of the Greek alphabet?
questions.explanation:
epsilon.

	(1) alpha, (2) beta, (3) gamma, (4) delta, (5) epsilon are the first five letters of the Greek alphabet.
